original: Forensic scientists employ various methods to determine the cause of death, including the examination of tissue specimens to identify the presence or absence of natural diseases and other microscopic findings. They also analyze toxicology in body tissues and fluids to ascertain the chemical causes of overdoses, poisonings, or other incidents involving toxic agents.
